[STRUCTURE]: Text is long and dense with many topics covered in a continuous flow without clear sectioning
[LOGIC]: Jumps between discussing historical theories and specific examples without clear connections

Discussion of the English nation in the 18th century seems disconnected from previous discussion of the Industrial Revolution
